Welcome to the general guide for BigPicture submission. 

You can find everything you need for submission and more in the [internal guideline document](https://bigpictureeu.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/wp3/Public%20documents/Data%20Submission%20Guidance%20documents/Data%20Contribution/Guideline%20Data%20Contribution%20of%20anonymous,%20clinical%20data%20for%20implementation%20of%20the%20action%20by%20Bigpicture%20beneficiaries_v1.3.docx?d=w54e831a5940d47328eacb27d8d9793e8&csf=1&web=1&e=2H6ixs).(Bigpicture internal, requires password)


Alternatively, you can find below the practical guide created by NBIS DevOps.

- The [preparation guide](preparation-guide.qmd), before you create a submission. 
- The [submission guide](submission-guide.qmd), when you are ready.

## Required tools and versions

The following tools are required for submission. Please make sure you are using **at least the minimal required versions** listed below. Links point to their official release pages.

- **[sda-cli v0.1.6](https://github.com/NBISweden/sda-cli/releases/tag/v0.1.6)**
- **[s3cmd v2.2.0](https://github.com/s3tools/s3cmd/releases/tag/v2.2.0)**
- **[bigpicture-metadata-interface v2.0.2](https://github.com/imi-bigpicture/bigpicture-metadata-interface/releases/tag/v2.0.2)**
  *(available only in a private Git repository)*

## Support

For any questions regarding data submission, please [email us](mailto:{{< var email.helpdesk >}}).
